mapper.select:
select p.id, p.device_specs, p.machine_situation, p.device_name, p.pic_no, p.material_specs, p.day_time, p.month_time, p.year_time, p.equipment_rate, p.rhythm, p.output, p.remark, p.sort, p.day_time, p.month_time, p.year_time, p.equipment_rate, p.rhythm, p.output, s.id as step_id, s.tool_name, s.step_require, s.step_no, s.content from tams_product_technics_scheme_process p left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on s.scheme_id = p.id and s.type=0 where 1=1
and p.technics_id = '${technics_id}'

select s.id, s.technics_name, s.code, s.type, s.is_excellent, s.technics_pic, s.is_recommend, s.product_id, (select count(0) from tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step w where w.scheme_id = p.id and w.type = 0) as processCount from tams_product_technics_scheme s left join tams_product_technics_scheme_process p on p.technics_id = s.id where 1=1
and s.product_id = '${product_id}'
order by s.is_excellent desc

select d.id, (select w.step_no from tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step w where w.scheme_id = p.id and w.type = 0) as step_no, d.tool_no, d.tool_name, d.specification, d.amount, d.tool_code, d.recommend_brand, d.price, (select count(0) from tams_detail_list d where d.scheme_no=s.id) as child from tams_product_technics_scheme_process p left join tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step s on s.scheme_id = p.id right join tams_detail_list d on d.scheme_no=s.id where 1=1
and p.technics_id = '${technics_id}'

select c.id, c.parts_name, (select w.step_no from tams_product_technics_scheme_work_step w where w.scheme_id = p.id and w.type = 0) as step_no, c.device_date, c.feed_date, c.rhythm, c.annual_output, c.production_program, c.machine_amount, c.device_mode, c.sort, c.tenant_id from tams_product_technics_scheme_process p right join tams_rhythm_collect c on c.scheme_no = p.id where 1=1
and p.technics_id = '${technics_id}'

select s.id, s.technics_name, s.code, s.type, s.is_excellent, s.technics_pic, s.is_recommend, s.product_id, s.sort, s.tenant_id, (select p.product_name from tams_product p where p.id=s.product_id) as product_name, p.specification from tams_product_technics_scheme s left join tams_product p on p.id=s.product_id
and p.product_name like '%${product_name}%'
and p.specification like '%${specification}%'
where 1=1
and s.code = '${code}'
order by s.is_excellent desc

select count(0) from tams_product_technics_scheme s left join tams_product p on p.id=s.product_id
and p.product_name like '%${product_name}%'
and p.specification like '%${specification}%'
where 1=1
and s.code = '${code}'

select 'technics' index_name, p.id product_id, p.product_name product_name, p.specification product_specification, p.material_quality product_material_quality, p.trade_mark product_trade_mark, p.product_label product_label, p.content product_content, s.id technics_id, s.technics_name technics_name, s.code technics_code FROM tams_product_technics_scheme s LEFT JOIN tams_product p ON p.ID = s.PRODUCT_ID

select 'technics' index_name, p.id product_id, p.product_name product_name, p.specification product_specification, p.material_quality product_material_quality, p.trade_mark product_trade_mark, p.product_label product_label, p.content product_content, s.id technics_id, s.technics_name technics_name, s.code technics_code FROM tams_product_technics_scheme s LEFT JOIN tams_product p ON p.ID = s.PRODUCT_ID WHERE s.id=#{id}
